hackathon-description-text: ArchHacks is an awesome HealthTech Hackathon at WashU October 27-29!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: A MacBook Pro for each team member!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Overall Hack by Express Scripts

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: A Fitbit Ionic for each team member!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Data Visualization by Pfizer

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Wireless Powerbeats for each team member!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Hack Addressing Socioeconomic Health Disparities by Centene

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Field & Co Weekender Bag for each team member!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best User Interface by Deloitte

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Amazon Echo Dot + $25 Amazon gift card for each team member!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Most Technically Interesting by Equifax

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: ASUS Zen Watch 3 for each team member!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Hardware Hack by Siemens

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: A Fitbit Charge 2 for each team member!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Hack for Health Communications by Epic

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $50 Amazon gift card for each team member and a virtual meeting with a representative of HealthX Ventures to discuss the team's idea!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Biggest World Impact by HealthX Ventures

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Each member of the winning team will receive a face to face interview with Panera for an internship!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Nutritional Hack by Panera
Best Hack Addressing Mental Health by HSIL Lab at BJC
Best Big (Open) Data Hack by WashU Institute for Informatics
Best Diabetes Hack by WashU Institute of Public Health
Most Business Viable Project by WashU's Skandalaris Center

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Facebook goody bag for each team member!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Social Hack by Facebook
Best IoT Hack Using a Qualcomm Device
Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS
Best Domain Name from Domain.com
Honorable Mention - Best Overall Hack
Honorable Mention - Best Overall Hack
Honorable Mention - Best Overall Hack

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: The submission should attempt to solve a problem related to health in a unique way.
The submission should be a practical attempt to solve a real-world problem around health.
The submission should be intuitive and visually appealing.
The submission should be functioning, even if it is buggy.

hackathon-description-header: An awesome Health Tech hackathon at WashU Oct 27-29
hackathon-location-description: Washington University in St. Louis - Hillman Hall
